scripts.demo-css: postcss demo/index.css -u postcss-import postcss-each postcss-cssnext postcss-for -o demo/build.css -w
scripts.demo: open demo/index.html && concurrently "npm run demo-css" "npm run demo-js"
scripts.watch-css: postcss css/index.css -u postcss-import postcss-each postcss-cssnext postcss-for -o $npm_package_config_css-source -w
scripts.build-css: postcss css/index.css -u postcss-import  postcss-cssnext postcss-for postcss-each cssnano -o $npm_package_config_css-source
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.watch: npm install && concurrently "npm run watch-js" "npm run watch-css"
